name: AlpInvest Partners
overview: AlpInvest Partners N.V. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in fund investments, secondary investments, co-investments, and mezzanine transactions. The firm invests in manufacturing, business and technology services, media and information, finance and insurance, retail, and healthcare sectors. It seeks to make fund investments across the spectrum of private equity market, including buyouts (growth, lower middle market, middle market, large, and later stage buyouts); venture capital; mezzanine; distressed securities; secondary; sustainable energy; and other specialty funds.

funding_round.source_description: CORE CAPITAL LEADS $9.0 MILLION INVESTMENT IN VPISYSTEMS
